name: Epic
about: Template for creating an epic
title: "[Epic] Title"
labels: epic
assignees: ''

---

### Epic Description
- **As a** [user/role]
- **I want** [feature/goal]
- **So that** [benefit/reason]

### User Stories
- [ ] [User Story]: Title and description for each user story linked to this epic.

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] High-level criteria for the epic's completion.

### Labels
- Add relevant labels here.
